title: TVS Motor partners what3words to offer easy navigation to 2-wheeler users
description: ​​The location technology of what3words divides the world into a grid of 3-metre squares and it gives each square a unique combination of three random words as address and helps in more accurate navigation.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
